original_text: Then I said, “Put a clean turban on his head.” So they put a clean turban on his head and clothed him, while the angel of the Lord stood by.
korean_text: 내가 말하되 정결한 관을 그의 머리에 씌우소서 하매 곧 정결한 관을 그 머리에 씌우며 옷을 입히고 여호와의 천사는 곁에 섰더라

sentences.original_text: Put a clean turban on his head
So they put a clean turban on his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그의 머리에 깨끗한 터번을 씌우니

sentences.original_text: while the angel of the Lord stood by
